Export.Routine: INARTTRACK #include COMSYS #include INConst ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Description of Function : ; ARTIKELINFORMATION BEIM LIEFERANTEN ; ; The supplier may have an Internet link which allows further product ; information to be retrieved. ; ; Pushes the hyperlink to the right of the Customs Rate info. ; ; Inputs : ; YKEY Item,Supplier ; ; ByRef : ; ; ; Returns : ; ; ; History : ; 25-Aug-2006 GRF SR12027: Use D8 rather than D1 ; 12-Jul-2005 GRF SR12027: Identify INARTK Product Description Use ; DT ARTIKELINFORMATION BEIM LIEFERANTEN ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new idItem,objINARTK,YARTIKEL,YLIEF,YURL set idItem = $$$KEY1(YKEY) set YLIEF = $$$KEY2(YKEY) ; supplier quit:YLIEF="" set YURL = $$$INLIEFInternetItemInformation($get(^INLIEF(YM,YLIEF,1))) ;URL DER ARTIKELBESTÃ„NDE ; D119 quit:YURL="" set objINARTK = $get(^INARTK(YM,$piece(YKEY,",",1),YLIEF,1)) set YARTIKEL = $$$INARTKSupplierItemNo(objINARTK) ; D8 set YARTIKEL = $translate($piece(YARTIKEL,"|",1)," ") write "     " write "     " write "     " write "     " write "     " write "     " write "     " write "  " write YCR set YURL=YURL_YARTIKEL write "" write YCR,"" write " " write $$^WWWTEXT(32196)," " ; "Item Information From Supplier" write " " quit
